column5: I hope that each and every one of you have a Very Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year.      To some of us the reason for the season!    Cheers!  Whopper

Beautiful!!      That must have taken some time to do.....thanks for sharing!  You would never know from the outside of my house but I love Christmas lights/decorations...the joke around here is that when I am done with the inside...we can't afford to do the outside  blyght  Happy Holidays!!!!
.......and a happy Hanukah too.
Merry Christmas to you & yours too Phil and all the best in the New Year !!  Lookin forward to sharing my boat with you again next September  Beautiful job on your home too
Looks like somebody has been busy! Looks great Phil!... is that your neighbors house?
Your house looks great Phil.  Looks like you guys have as much snow as we do........NONE  Merry Christmas to you and your family !!!
Happy Hoildays to you and your family Phil. Great job on the house now you just need about a foot of snow to make it all complete.  Enjoy the Holidays  Mike
Happy holidays to everyone here, hope you have a good time with family...  Mike
Merry Christmas to you and yours, Phil!  4 day work week this week - 3 days next week - 4 days the next week!  I love this time of year!!  dk
Merry Christmas to you and your family Phil.  Great job on the decorations outside, looks beautiful.

Phil, Beautiful job on the decorations Bud! A very merry christmas to you and your family from mine. Finally meeting up with you this past summer was a truly nice experience and we are very much looking forward to getting together again. (How are the windows on your work trailer?)...scoundrels!!!!!!! Take care and safe holidays Bud!
Merry Christmas Phil, Nice job on yur home.  Is your last name Griswald?? Looking forward to meeting you in 2007.
One of my favorite movies and it get's funnier everytime I see, infact I just saw it again last night
Good job with the lights. And a happy safe Xmas...

Thanks everyone for the kind words.  Believe or not I have actually downsized the last couple of years, for a few years it was out of control.   Besides the installation (about six full days) the maintence was taking way to much time and by the time it was all up and running right it was time to take em down (another three days). But I do enjoy doing it.  One year I was late getting them up and I had people stopping at the house to see if everything was ok and if I needed any help  Peter the trailer had bee sitting at the lot at my office and when I took the locks off so they wouldn't bigger up the trailer it must have made them mad so they shot the window out of my office, that didn't go over to good with the landlord.  Lew it's always a big joke after I get the lights done because my wife will say "Clark your lights aren't twinkling"  Happy Holidays All!  Whopper
looks great! I cant wait to have house to decorate one day!
Awesome Whopper. Wouldn't that house look great on the shores of Hollinshead??? Merry Christmas Bud...
very nice Phil, thanks for sharing Merry Christmas (NOT Xmas) to you & yours
from our family myself [shawn] my lady [fishergirl72] and my little girl [angelina] a little fisher girl   in training have a wonderful christmas and a happy new year
Happy Holidays to all.
Back at ya Phil, take care in the new year.
